# SetEnableWithCompletion

**Instance Method**

Controls the enable state of the interrupt source.

## Declaration

```swift
kern_return_t SetEnableWithCompletion(bool enable, IODispatchSourceCancelHandlerhandler);
```

## Parameters

- **enable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to enable the dispatch source. Specify `true` to enable the source or `false` to disable it.
- **handler**: An optional block to execute after this method successfully disables the dispatch source.

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/kIOReturnSuccess] on success, or another value if an error occurs. See [doc://com.apple.driverkit/documentation/DriverKit/error-codes].

## Starting and Stopping the Dispatch Source

- **Cancel**: Cancels all callbacks from the dispatch source.
